name: Gutenberg Blocks for AMP with Design Library
author: Magazine3

sections.description:
AMP Blocks is a collection of page building blocks for the Gutenberg.
AMP Blocks give you the capability to easily create great websites with just a few clicks, which will show in both AMP and Non AMP Pages.

NOTICE

AMP Blocks has been depreciated but the innovation will be continued on another revolutionary plugin called AMP Enhancer (Compatibility Layer for Official AMP Plugin), so we recommend you to use AMP Enhancer plugin. Regular development will be done here as well as customer support will be provided.

View All Demos | View Features

Features

**üìö Design library – Get professionally designed Web elements with 1 click! Just import them, edit them and make them yours

**üì¶ Canvas Mode – Allows you to edit in full screen which gives you an ultimate web design experience. First Time ever in the Gutenberg niche to have such feature!

**‚è∞ New Designs Every week – The Design library will get updated when there are new designs available. We are planning to release few designs every week.

**‚ö° AMP Support – The designs looks exactly the same in AMP as it does in the non-AMP. This is the only plugin which has the deepest AMP integration available.

**‚ú® Lightweight – AMP Blocks was made with performance in mind to give the lightest experience possible.

Design Demos

sections.faq:
How to install and use this AMP Blocks plugin?

After you Active this plugin, just go to Dashboard > CLick on Post (or) Page, and Click on ‘Enter Canvas Mode’ and then click ‘Design Library’ to import the design.

How do I report bugs and suggest new features?

You can report the bugs for this amp-blocks plugin here

Will you include features to my request?

Yes, Absolutely! We would suggest you send your feature request by creating an issue in Github . It helps us organize the feedback easily.

  • New Block: Team – 1 Design

1.2.1 (19 Feb 2020)

  • Made compatible with Level Up Theme

1.2 (19 Feb 2020)

  • New Text Block Designs are added
  • New Block: Text – 10 Design Blocks

1.1 (17 Feb 2020)

  • New Feature, Pricing and Team Block Designs are added.
  • New Block: Feature – 9 Design Blocks
  • New Block: Pricing – 7 Design Blocks
  • New Block: Team – 3 Design Blocks

1.0 (13 Feb 2020)

  • New Feature Design BLocks are added in the AMP blocks, We introduce Column Block which will show, Row and Section module and is easy for drag and drop the designs, which you feel like a Design tool for Gutenberg and the designs are Fully compatible with AMP.
  • New Canvas mode, which will show full width Template in the page.
  • New Block: Heading
  • New Block: Text
  • New Block: Button
  • New Block: Button Group
  • New Block: Icon
  • New Block: Icon List
  • New Block: Image
  • New Block: Video

0.3 (18 Dec 2019)

  • New Block: Team
  • New Block: Posts

0.2 (13 Dec 2019)

  • New Block: Button
  • New Block: Testimonial Slider

0.1 (23 Nov 2019)

  • Initial release

Install npm modules => npm install
to run the development mode => npm start
To run production mode => npm run-script build

short_description: AMP Blocks is a collection of page building blocks for the Gutenberg.
description:
AMP Blocks is a collection of page building blocks for the Gutenberg.
AMP Blocks give you the capability to easily create great websites with just a few clicks, which will show in both AMP and Non AMP Pages.

NOTICE

AMP Blocks has been depreciated but the innovation will be continued on another revolutionary plugin called AMP Enhancer (Compatibility Layer for Official AMP Plugin), so we recommend you to use AMP Enhancer plugin. Regular development will be done here as well as customer support will be provided.

View All Demos | View Features

Features

**üìö Design library – Get professionally designed Web elements with 1 click! Just import them, edit them and make them yours

**üì¶ Canvas Mode – Allows you to edit in full screen which gives you an ultimate web design experience. First Time ever in the Gutenberg niche to have such feature!

**‚è∞ New Designs Every week – The Design library will get updated when there are new designs available. We are planning to release few designs every week.

**‚ö° AMP Support – The designs looks exactly the same in AMP as it does in the non-AMP. This is the only plugin which has the deepest AMP integration available.

**‚ú® Lightweight – AMP Blocks was made with performance in mind to give the lightest experience possible.
